Subject: Neo Beast Wars

::Zeus/Mosquitor/Annihilator/Killer/Zardus/DeathStorm/Prowl/Striker::

Zeus flies out of Set's and Shuko's ship. He looks around and pulls out his 
rifle. Like the thundergod that his namesake was, he fires a bolt at 
Mosquitor, who had just flown into the battlefield. Mosquitor crashes into a 
tree and shoots acid back at Zeus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator and Killer emerge from the ship. They look around.

"Sub commander, eh?" Killer yells at Rampage, "Sub-commander THIS!" He adds 
as he fires at Rampage from his launcher.

Annihilator opens fire at Inferno.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus falls forward as the predacons' shots hit him, slamming him through 
the boulder in front of him. He stands up, severely damaged, and turns to 
face Manterror and Injector. "We are allied. Instead of firing at me, you 
could be firing at them!" He says, pointing to the ship.

While pointing to the ship, he sees the new defenders emerge out of it, 
firing at the attackers. He growls. It was time to leave.

"Beast Mode!" He says and transforms, snatching Nemesis in his talons.

"All allience members, return to base." He says into his comm-link as he 
flies off with Nemesis in his talons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm flies back toward the alliance base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl smiles at Iron Raptor. "No problem."

He frowns as he hears gunshots, explosions, and screams coming from the 
direction of the ship. "Sounds like a battle. Let's be careful." He says as 
he sneaks into the forest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker takes the liquid from Zyber and drinks it, making a face at the 
taste. He looks at her and then shifts his gaze to Rowdy Wolf.

"He's a predacon," He says in the form of an accusation.
